Text: I have a question which tv show you prefer the most?

I followed few recent: Monk, Castle, Lost, "24", FF, Ashes to ashes, Mentalist and In plain sight. TBBT of comedy-shows.
But, they wasn't my 'all-time-favored', these are "dead" now - Firefly and Veronica Mars. Followed by Life on Mars, 4400, Journeyman, BSG and StarTrek Enterprise. Pretty colorful, right?
well i'm really interested to see out for 4400 but all big files together will make around 20gb do u know any small file rips........

@hkoraddi: Yeah, but I wanted badly enough to split downloads during three months. Back then, I payed by the traffic. I can send you a .dlc of DVDrips, alive, and upped by on of my favored uploaders.
I hope you can open some junk-mail account where I can send attachment (few kB .dlc) for free and fast as hell MU.
16.44 Giga BTW, smallest one can find.

Thank you my friend, I hope that you have a gr8 weekend. Thanks for all the hard work for all the shows even though most of the shows seasons have ended I will still be around to support your uploads, thanks again my friend.

Cheers
Stev

@Stev: Thank you, my friend.

@hkoraddi: I hope you've got the mail.
